text:
ENTRANTES (Starters)
Chips and Salsa - 13

Freshly made tortilla chips served with house-made salsa.

Guacamole - 18

Creamy avocado dip made with fresh avocados, tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and lime juice.

Queso con Chorizo - 20

Melted cheese dip mixed with spicy chorizo sausage.

Molotes - 24

Crispy masa fritters stuffed with potatoes and cheese.

Esquites - 16

Mexican street corn salad made with roasted corn, mayonnaise, cotija cheese, and chili powder.

Poco Loco Taquitos - 19

Rolled and fried tortillas filled with chicken, served with guacamole and sour cream.

Flautas - 17

Crispy rolled tortillas filled with shredded beef or chicken, served with salsa verde and sour cream.

Chicharrones - 14

Crispy fried pork rinds served with lime and chili powder.

Nachos - 22

Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, guacamole, sour cream, and pico de gallo.

Mejillones - 20

Steamed mussels cooked in a white wine and garlic sauce.

MAS GRANDE (Main Courses)
Quesadillas - 20

Flour tortillas filled with melted cheese and your choice of chicken, beef, or vegetables.

Birria Burrito - 22

A large flour tortilla filled with braised beef, rice, beans, and cheese, served with consomé for dipping.

Chimichanga - 22

Deep-fried burrito filled with your choice of meat, cheese, and beans, topped with guacamole and sour cream.

Enchiladas con Carne - 27

Corn tortillas stuffed with beef, topped with red sauce and melted cheese.

Enchiladas de Batata - 26

Corn tortillas stuffed with sweet potatoes and black beans, topped with green sauce and melted cheese.

Tacos - (choice of 3) - 20

Carne Asada - Grilled steak with onions and cilantro.

Baja Fish - Beer-battered fish with cabbage and chipotle mayo.

Barbacoa Beef - Slow-cooked beef with pickled onions.

Chicken Chipotle - Spicy chicken with lettuce and tomatoes.

Carnitas - Braised pork with pickled red onions.

Diablo Shrimp - Spicy shrimp with avocado and pico de gallo.

Mushroom Adobo - Marinated mushrooms with garlic and herbs.
name: El Tres
